special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: *BAMF*
special_powers.description: Give Nightcrawler a power action and place him in any square within line of fire. If that square is within 4 squares of the square he began this action in, he may make a close attack.

special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: LOCALIZED WEATHER
special_powers.description: Storm can use Smoke Cloud as a free action.

special_powers.name: HIS DEATH REMEMBERED
special_powers.description: When Thunderbird is KO'd, choose one: heal all friendly characters with the X-Men keyword 1 click -or- modify the combat values of all friendly characters with the X-Men keyword by +1 until the end of your next turn.

special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: PUNCHING A FIGHTER JET
special_powers.description: Thunderbird can use Exploit Weakness. When he does, KO him after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: SWITCH TO DIAMOND FORM IN THE NICK OF TIME!
special_powers.description: When Emma Frost would be KO'd, you may replace her with UXM #005b Emma Frost on click #6. That character can't be healed this game.

special_powers.name: TEACHING THE NEXT GENERATION
special_powers.description: Emma Frost can use Perplex. When she does, you may instead choose a combat value other than damage and modify that value on each friendly character that shares a keyword with her within her range, regardless of line of fire.

special_powers.name: DIAMOND FORM
special_powers.description: Emma Frost takes a maximum of 1 damage from range attacks.

special_powers.name: INJURED BUT STILL HERE
special_powers.description: STOP.  Emma Frost can use Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: HEALING FACTOR
special_powers.description: When Wolverine clears action tokens, you may heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: CATCH WEB'S GOT EM
special_powers.description: Genoshan Magistrate can use Incapacitate. When he does and hits, after actions resolve you may place the hit character adjacent.

special_powers.name: THE IGNORED MUTANTS
special_powers.description: During force construction, you may pay 15 points for this character. If you do, at the beginning of the game, choose a starting line. During force construction you may pay 10 points for up to 6 of this character. If you do, at the beginning of the game, an opponent must choose a distinct starting line for each one.

special_powers.name: WE LIVE IN HIDING
special_powers.description: Morlock can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: THIS ONE HAS AN ENERGY BLAST
special_powers.description: Morlock has a range value of 5.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SEISMIC PUNCH
special_powers.description: When Arclight misses one or more close attacks, after actions resolve she can use Quake as a free action.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: BRUTAL DISPLAY OF MIGHT
special_powers.description: When Blockbuster hits with a close object attack, after actions resolve modify all opposing character's defense values by -1 until end of turn.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: PIN HIM DOWN!
special_powers.description: When Harpoon hits with a range attack, the hit target can't be moved or placed until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SUMMON YOUR WORST FEARS
special_powers.description: Lady Mastermind can use Mind Control and Stealth. When Lady Mastermind uses Mind Control, after actions resolve give the hit target an action token.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: POWER ME UP!
special_powers.description: When making a range attack, Prism modifies his damage value by +1 for each adjacent friendly character with a printed range value of 4 or more.

special_powers.name: BRITTLE CRYSTAL
special_powers.description: Prism takes a maximum 1 damage from range attacks. When Prism takes knockback damage, KO him.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SHURIKENS AT 200 MPH
special_powers.description: When Riptide uses Sidestep, after actions resolve he can use Pulse Wave as a free action.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: JUST ONE TOUCH
special_powers.description: Scrambler can use Outwit, but only to target adjacent characters regardless of line of fire. When he does, counter all powers showing on the target's dial.

special_powers.name: FREEDOM FORCE
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve he can use Force Blast as a free action.

special_powers.name: DOESN'T BACK DOWN
special_powers.description: Stonewall can't be knocked back, moved, or placed by opposing game effects.

special_powers.name: BUILT LIKE A WALL
special_powers.description: Stonewall can use Invincible. If an adjacent opposing character hits Stonewall and the attack roll is doubles, after actions resolve you may knock back the attacker a number of squares equal to their damage value.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: MAKING WEAPONS TO HUNT
special_powers.description: Give John Greycrow a power action to equip a standard object in an adjacent square or a square he occupies. If it is a standard light object, the EFFECT is: he can use Precision Strike. If it is a standard heavy object, the EFFECT is he can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: INTO THE DARKFORCE
special_powers.description: Vanisher can use Phasing/Teleport, Stealth, and the Carry ability to carry up to 3 characters.

special_powers.name: MAKE XAVIER PAY
special_powers.description: Opposing characters using the X-Men team ability decrease the result of their roll by 1.

special_powers.name: YOU'VE TAKEN YER BEST SHOT! NOW IT'S MY TURN!
special_powers.description: When Wolverine takes damage, place a number of Heal tokens equal to half the damage taken on his character card. Give Wolverine a free action and remove a Heal token to heal 1 click.

special_powers.name: BETTER CHUMPS THAN YOU HAVE TRIED TO KILL ME, BUB
special_powers.description: When Wolverine would be KO'd by an opponent's attack, you may remove 3 Heal tokens. If you do, turn Wolverine to click #7 instead.

special_powers.name: BEST THERE IS...
special_powers.description: Wolverine can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When he does, the minimum d6 result is his printed damage and, if the result is 6, place a Heal token on his character card.

special_powers.name: FIELD LEADER OF THE X-MEN
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds, he can use Probability Control until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TIME LOCKED
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't use Probability Control to reroll attacks made by or targeting this character.

special_powers.name: DO THEY STILL CALL ME "BOUNCING BEAST"?
special_powers.description: Beast can use Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: PHASED IN THE NICK OF TIME
special_powers.description: When Kitty Pryde would be KO'd, you may replace her with UXM #023b Kitty Pryde on click #6. That character can't be healed this game.

special_powers.name: PROFESSOR PRYDE
special_powers.description: Kitty Pryde can use Leadership. When she does and succeeds, instead of removing a token normally, she may remove an action token from each adjacent friendly character with the All-New X-Men keyword regardless of point value.

special_powers.name: PHASING ATTACK
special_powers.description: Kitty Pryde can use Phasing/Teleport and Stealth. When she uses Phasing/Teleport, after actions resolve she may make a close attack targeting all characters whose square she moved through. Hit characters are given an action token instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: INJURED BUT STILL HERE
special_powers.description: STOP. Kitty Pryde can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: TIME LOCKED
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't use Probability Control to reroll attacks made by or targeting this character.

special_powers.name: CONCUSSIVE BLAST
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Force Blast.

special_powers.name: SWEEPING BLAST
special_powers.description: Give Cyclops a power action. Choose both a horizontal and vertical direct line of fire. Make a range attack using Improved Targeting: Characters targeting all opposing characters within 5 squares and line of fire that occupy squares in or between the chosen lines. Hit characters are dealt 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: TIME LOCKED
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't use Probability Control to reroll attacks made by or targeting this character.

special_powers.name: PSYCHOKINETIC MERGE
special_powers.description: Jean Grey can use Perplex. When she does, she may target a character with the All-New X-Men keyword regardless of range and line of fire.

special_powers.name: I'M HOLDING A BLACK HOLE GENERATOR
special_powers.description: Chief Magistrate can use Pulse Wave. When she does, after actions resolve give each hit character an action token and then place the hit characters adjacent until all adjacent squares are occupied.

special_powers.name: ADULT
special_powers.description: Brood can use Charge and has the Wing Speed Symbol.

special_powers.name: PARALYTIC POISON STINGER
special_powers.description: Brood can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When it does, if the result was 4-6, after actions resolve give the hit character an action token.

special_powers.name: CALIBAN KNOWS ALL THE TUNNELS
special_powers.description: Caliban can use Phasing/Teleport and the Carry ability. When he begins movement in hindering terrain, modify his speed value by +3.

special_powers.name: EXCEPTIONAL MUTANT TRACKING
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters can use Improved Targeting: Hindering to target characters within 6 squares of Caliban.

special_powers.name: I CAN STILL FLY, BUT IT TAKES A LOT OUT OF ME
special_powers.description: Once per game, Magneto can use Running Shot as a free action and has the Wing symbol for that action.

special_powers.name: TRACKING THOSE WHO WOULD HARM MUTANTS
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Sidestep and Stealth.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC SHIELDING
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Willpower.

special_powers.name: OUTTA DA WAY!
special_powers.description: Give Juggernaut a power action to move in a direct path using Improved Movement: Hindering, Destroy Blocking, Characters. After actions resolve, make a close attack targeting all characters he moved through. Hit characters are dealt 3 damage instead of normal damage and placed into a square that Juggernaut didn't move through adjacent to their current square.

special_powers.name: THE HELMET PROTECTS ME
special_powers.description: Juggernaut begins the game with his Helmet attached. As long as it's attached, Juggernaut can use Willpower and can't be targeted by opposing Mind Control, Outwit, or Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When the Helmet is attached and Juggernaut is hit by a close attack, the attack deals no damage and Juggernaut and the attacking character each roll a d6 adding their printed damage values to their respective rolls. If your result is lower, remove the Helmet.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: MASSACRES ARE MY SPECIALTY
special_powers.description: Sabretooth can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. Give Sabretooth a close action to make any numbers of close attacks, each targeting an adjacent opposing character that was not already targeted during this action.

special_powers.name: FREEDOM FORCE
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve he can use Force Blast as a free action.

special_powers.name: MACH 1 PUNCH
special_powers.description: Super Saber can use Force Blast and Hypersonic Speed.

special_powers.name: FULL BLAST
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When he does, he can use Improved Targeting: Destroy Blocking.

special_powers.name: LEADING THE NEXT GENERATION
special_powers.description: Cyclops can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds, he may instead remove the action token from any friendly character within range that shares a keyword with him.

special_powers.name: YOU DON'T WANT TO DO THIS
special_powers.description: Professor X can use Outwit normally or as a Power action. If activated as a Power action, he does not require line of fire and you may attach the Mental Lock marker to the targeted character. While the Mental Lock marker is attached, the effect of this Outwit doesn't end and Professor X can't use Outwit. The Mental Lock marker remains attached as long as that character is within Professor X's range. At the beginning of your turn, you and that character's controller both roll 2d6 that can't be rerolled. If your result is lower, remove the Mental Lock marker.

special_powers.name: ERASE YOU FROM YOUR ENEMIES' MINDS
special_powers.description: Professor X and adjacent friendly characters with the X-Men keyword can use Shape Change if they are not on their starting click. If they succeed using this Shape Change no friendly character with the X-Men keyword can be targeted this turn.

special_powers.name: TIME LOCKED
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't use Probability Control to reroll attacks made by or targeting this character.

special_powers.name: MASTER AERIALIST
special_powers.description: Angel can use Charge. When he does, after actions resolve he can use Sidestep as a free action and automatically breaks away when doing so.

special_powers.name: SWIFT AS A FALCON
special_powers.description: Angel can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: TIME LOCKED
special_powers.description: Opposing characters can't use Probability Control to reroll attacks made by or targeting this character.

special_powers.name: FROZEN IN PLACE
special_powers.description: Iceman can use Barrier normally or as a free action. When activated as a free action he may only place up to 2 blocking markers. Opposing characters adjacent to Iceman's Barrier markers must break away.

special_powers.name: ICE SHIELD
special_powers.description: Iceman and adjacent friendly characters can use Toughness.

special_powers.name: HEALING FACTOR
special_powers.description: When X-23 clears action tokens, you may heal her 1 click.

special_powers.name: FURIOUS CHARGE
special_powers.description: X-23 can use Charge and Flurry.

special_powers.name: ADAMANTIUM CLAWS
special_powers.description: X-23 can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When she does, if the result is 1-2, once per turn you may reroll the roll.

special_powers.name: AVENGERS UNITY DIVISION
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve he can use the X-Men team ability as a free action.

special_powers.name: INVERTED AND LEASHED
special_powers.description: Once per game, when an opposing character would be KO'd by Sabretooth, you may instead keep that dial on its last non-KO click. If you do, after actions resolve heal Sabretooth 2 clicks and remove all action tokens from him.

special_powers.name: TRACK DOWN THE GENE-TRASH
special_powers.description: Give Sabretooth a free action if he is within 3 squares of an opposing character. If you do, he and adjacent friendly characters can use Sidestep this turn.

special_powers.name: HELM OF CYTTORAK
special_powers.description: Juggernaut begins the game with his Helmet attached. As long as it's attached, Juggernaut can use Willpower and can't be targeted by opposing Mind Control, Outwit, or Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When Juggernaut takes 2 or more damage and the Helmet is attached, the opponent places the Helmet up to 6 squares away. When Juggernaut moves through a square containing the Helmet, attach it to him.

special_powers.name: KEEP YOUR HEAD DOWN, KID
special_powers.description: Juggernaut can use Charge and the Carry ability and Improved Movement: Hindering, Destroy Blocking.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC SHIELD FOR MY ALLIES
special_powers.description: Give Magneto a power action to attach the Magnetic Shield to another friendly character, removing it from anywhere else. That character can use Energy Shield/Defelection as long as it is attached. When that character takes damage from a range attack or Magneto is KO'd, remove the Magnetic Shield marker.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC FIELD
special_powers.description: Magneto can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Toughness.

special_powers.name: BROOD IMPLANTATION
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from Brood Queen's close attack, give that character an Infected token. Characters with one or more Infected tokens modify their attack and defense values by -1. When a character with an Infected token is KO'd, place a UXM #027 Brood on click #3 in that square.

special_powers.name: BROOD EGG
special_powers.description: Brood Queen begins the game with the Brood Egg attached. Give her a power action to place an attached Brood Egg adjacent.

special_powers.name: IT'S HATCHING
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, reattach this to Brood Queen, then place UXM #027 Brood on click #3 in the square this occupied. If Brood Queen is KO'd, instead remove it from the map then place a UXM #027 Brood on click #3 in the square this occupied.

special_powers.name: DEADLY COILS
special_powers.description: Omega Red has Giant Reach: 3. When Omega Red hits a character with a close attack, after actions resolve you may place the hit character adjacent.

special_powers.name: ENERGY VAMPIRE
special_powers.description: Omega Red Begins the game on click #3. Omega Red can use Steal Energy and when he does, he may heal past his starting line.

special_powers.name: SOLAR FLARE IN THE NICK OF TIME
special_powers.description: When Sunfire would be KO'd, you may replace him with UXM #043b Sunfire on click #7. That character can't be healed this game.

special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: AVENGERS UNITY DIVISION
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve he can use the X-Men team ability as a free action.

special_powers.name: RADIATING INTENSE HEAT
special_powers.description: Sunfire can use Energy Shield/Deflection. When Sunfire is hit with a close attack, after actions resolve deal the attacker 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: SOLAR FLARE
special_powers.description: Sunfire can use Energy Explosion, Poison and Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: INJURED BUT STILL HERE
special_powers.description: STOP. Sunfire can use Toughness.

special_powers.name: BAMF!
special_powers.description: Nightcrawler can use Phasing/Teleport and the Carry ability. When Nightcrawler uses Phasing/Teleport, after actions resolve place the BAMF marker in the square he began movement in, removing it from anywhere else. When Nightcrawler is missed by an attack, after actions resolve you may place him into or adjacent to the BAMF marker's square.

special_powers.name: WINDS TO HOLD YOU, VILLAIN!
special_powers.description: When Storm targets and hits one or more opposing characters, after actions resolve you may attach the Cyclone marker to one hit target, removing it from anywhere else. While the Cyclone marker is attached, that character must break away on any action in which it moves, can't automatically break away, and is dealt 1 damage at the end of its turn. When that character successfully breaks away, remove the Cyclone marker.

special_powers.name: THUNDER AND LIGHTNING
special_powers.description: Storm can use Energy Explosion. If both Storm and all targets of her ranged attack are outdoors, she can use Precision Strike.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: GETTING DIZZY? WANT TO LIE DOWN?
special_powers.description: Vertigo can use Incapacitate. When she does, after actions resolve, either modify each hit character's defense value by -1 until your next turn -or- a single hit character's defense value by -2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: FREEDOM FORCE
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve, she can use Force Blast as a free action.

special_powers.name: SHAPESHIFTER
special_powers.description: Mystique can use Shape Change and beings the game with a Shapeshift token on her card. While she has a Shapeshift token, she can use Improved Movement: Characters and opposing characters can only target her if they began the turn adjacent to her. When Mystique targets an opposing character with an attack, remove all Shapeshift tokens. When she succeeds using Shape Change, if she doesn't have one, place a Shapeshift token on her card.

special_powers.name: FREEDOM FORCE
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve he can use Force Blast as a free action.

special_powers.name: TAKE THEM DOWN!
special_powers.description: Crimson Commando can use Close Combat Expert and Leadership. When he uses Leadership and succeeds, other friendly characters that share a keyword with him can use Sidestep this turn.

special_powers.name: DEATH FROM ABOVE
special_powers.description: Dark Angel can use Hypersonic Speed. When he does he can use Flurry as a free action instead of the close attack.

special_powers.name: CELESTIAL DEATH SEED
special_powers.description: Dark Angel can use Toughness and can use Regeneration as a free action or normally. When he uses Regeneration normally, roll a second d6 and keep the higher result.

special_powers.name: SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST
special_powers.description: Opposing characters of 75 points or less modify their attack and damage values by -1 when attacking Dark Angel.

special_powers.name: THESE ARE THE X-MEN THAT I REMEMBER
special_powers.description: If there's a friendly character on the map with the All-New X-Men or X-Men keywords that has the same name but a different collector's number than another character on the map, Beast can use Probability Control.

special_powers.name: A FINE FORM, INDEED
special_powers.description: Beast can use Combat Reflexes, Super Senses and Toughness.

special_powers.name: YES, YES, SMARTEST MUTANT-SIMIAN-MAN IN THE ROOM
special_powers.description: Beast can use Outwit. When he does, instead of targeting one character within range and line of fire, he may choose to target every opposing character within 4 squares and choose a power on each of them to counter.

special_powers.name: FROZEN SOLID
special_powers.description: When Iceman moves, after actions resolve you may make a close attack targeting a single opposing character whose square he moved through and didn't target with an attack that action. If you hit, attach the Ice Wall marker to that character, removing it from any other character. As long as the Ice Wall marker is attached, that character can't be moved, placed, given actions, or targeted with an attack. At the end of the next turn, remove the Ice Wall marker.

special_powers.name: REBUILD THE ICE
special_powers.description: Iceman can use Barrier and Regeneration.

special_powers.name: ICY FATE
special_powers.description: When Iceman hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may give that character an action token.

special_powers.name: AVENGERS UNITY DIVISION
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve he can use the X-Men team ability as a free action.

special_powers.name: YOU'VE BECOME AN ENERGY VAMPIRE
special_powers.description: Rogue can use Steal Energy. When she targets a single opposing character with a close attack, choose a standard power that character can use. If she hits, after actions resolve she can use the chosen power and the hit character's printed range value until you choose and hit again.

special_powers.name: SIMON LIVES THROUGH ME
special_powers.description: If you didn't pay 150 points, Rogue is KO'd when she crosses the red KO line.

special_powers.name: WONDER MAN'S IONIC POTENTIAL UNLEASHED
special_powers.description: STOP. For the rest of the game, Rogue can't be healed beyond her red KO line.

special_powers.name: PHOENIX UNLEASHED IN THE NICK OF TIME!
special_powers.description: When Phoenix would be KO'd, you may replace her with UXM #053b Phoenix on click #9. That character can't be healed this game.

special_powers.name: ALL-NEW, ALL-DIFFERENT X-MEN
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When this character is healed by the X-Men team ability, modify its combat values except damage by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: I AM LIFE INCARNATE
special_powers.description: Phoenix can use Invincible and Regeneration.

special_powers.name: POWER IS SURGING THROUGH ME UNCONTROLLABLY
special_powers.description: Give Phoenix a free action to roll a d6 that can't be rerolled and modify her combat values according to the result until your next turn. 1 modify by -1 5 modify by +1 6 modify by +2

special_powers.name: MYSTERIOUSLY "TRANSPORTED" TO THE 18TH CENTURY
special_powers.description: When Phoenix's attack roll is 5 or less or the attack roll of an opposing character attacking her is 5 or less, after actions resolve remove an action token from her.

special_powers.name: INJURED BUT STILL HERE
special_powers.description: STOP. Phoenix can use Energy Shield/Deflection. If she is at 250 points, she can use Impervious.

special_powers.name: AVENGERS UNITY DIVISION
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve he can use the X-Men team ability as a free action.

special_powers.name: IT'S LIKE I'M EVERYWHERE AT ONCE
special_powers.description: When Quicksilver moves through a square, you may immediately place the Speed Shadow marker in it, removing it from anywhere else. Whenever Quicksilver makes a close attack, he may target characters adjacent to the Speed Shadow marker.

special_powers.name: FASTER THAN YOU'LL EVER BE
special_powers.description: Quicksilver can use Hypersonic Speed. When he does he can automatically break away and he can use Flurry as a free action instead of the close attack.

special_powers.name: AVENGERS UNITY DIVISION
special_powers.description: When this character is given a move action, after actions resolve she can use the X-Men team ability as a free action.

special_powers.name: HEX MAGICK
special_powers.description: Give Scarlet Witch a power action to attach the Hex Magic marker to a character within range and line of fire, removing it from anywhere else. If that character is friendly, when that character attacks, a Critical Hit is an attack roll of 10-12. If that character is opposing, when that character attacks, a Critical Miss is an attack roll of 2-4. When Scarlet Witch is KO'd, remove the Hex Magic marker.

special_powers.name: WINDS OF MAGICK
special_powers.description: Scarlet Witch can use Enhancement and Probability Control.

special_powers.name: PIXIE DUST
special_powers.description: Pixie can use Smoke Cloud as a free action but places only 1 hindering marker. Characters occupying this hindering marker modify their defense values by -1 in addition to attack values.

special_powers.name: TELEPORTATION SPELL
special_powers.description: Pixie can use Phasing/Teleport. When she does she may carry characters with "wing movement symbol" and may carry 2 characters. She may carry 4 characters instead if they all have the X-Men keyword.

special_powers.name: SOUL DAGGER
special_powers.description: Pixie can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Precision Strike.

special_powers.name: HE'S USING ORDINARY PEOPLE LIKE PUPPETS!
special_powers.description: When building your force, you may pay 35 points to equip Proteus to a character of 100 points or less. When the equipped character is KO'd, equip this to another friendly character of 100 points or less. If you can't, place him on click #10 into the square of the last character he was equipped and he can't be healed.

special_powers.name: BURNING OUT HOST BODIES
special_powers.description: Modify the combat values of the equipped character by +1. At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled 1-2: Deal the equipped character 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: ONLY DIRECT CONTACT WITH METAL CAN HARM ME
special_powers.description: STOP. Proteus takes damage only from close attacks.

special_powers.name: THE WALLS ARE ATTACKING!
special_powers.description: Give Proteus a power action to make a close attack targeting each opposing character within 6 squares that is adjacent to blocking terrain. Hit characters are each dealt this character's damage value.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL TELEPATHIC IMMUNITY
special_powers.description: Cameron Hodge can't be targeted by Mind Control or Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: PHENOMENAL REPAIR RATE AND PHASING MODULE
special_powers.description: When Cameron Hodge has two action tokens, he can use Super Senses. At the beginning of your turn, if Cameron Hodge has two action tokens, he can use Regeneration as a free action.

special_powers.name: IMPALE
special_powers.description: Give Cameron Hodge a close action to make a close attack targeting a character within 3 squares and line of fire. Damage dealt from this attack is penetrating and the hit character may be placed in a square within 3 squares and line of fire of Cameron Hodge.

special_powers.name: I'M DONE WITH YOU, PRETTY
special_powers.description: When Malice is KO'd, you may equip her to another friendly character. Character can use Perplex and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: STILL FIGURING OUT YOUR POWERS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. Until your next turn, on a result of 3-4: Malice can use Force Blast. 5-6: Malice can use Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT WHAT YOU GET
special_powers.description: Malice can use Perplex and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: MUTANT MASSACRE
special_powers.description: The first time during your turn that one or more opposing characters are KO'd, after actions resolve choose one: this turn, modify this character's speed, attack, and damage values by +1; -or- heal this character of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SCHEMES WITHIN SCHEMES YOU CANNOT STOP
special_powers.description: Mister Sinister can use Mastermind. If opposing Probability Control was used during an attack that hit Mister Sinister or an adjacent friendly character, after actions resolve you may place the hit character anywhere on the map.

special_powers.name: GET BACK IN THE FIGHT, MINION
special_powers.description: Mister Sinister can use Leadership and Support. When he uses Support and heals a character with the Marauders keyword, after actions resolve you may exchange the places of that character and another friendly character with the Marauders keyword within 8 squares of Mister Sinister.

special_powers.name: READY, COMRADE?
special_powers.description: Give Colossus a free action to attach an adjacent friendly UXM #066 Weapon X. As long as Weapon X is attached, Colossus has a range value of 8. When Colossus makes a ranged attack with UXM #066 Weapon X attached, after actions resolve place Weapon X adjacent to the target of that attack. When Colossus is KO'd with Weapon X attached, place Weapon X in the square Colossus occupied.

special_powers.name: THIS ENTIRE WORLD IS DEAD DREAMS AND SCRAP
special_powers.description: If there are no Scrap Metal markers attached to Magneto, you may give him a power action to destroy up to two walls or squares of printed Blocking terrain within 8 squares and attach that many Scrap Metal markers (maximum 2).  Give Magneto a free action and remove all attached Scrap Metal markers to make that many object attacks as if he was holding a heavy object.

special_powers.name: CREATOR OF THE X-MEN IN THIS REALITY
special_powers.description: When building your force, you may chose a character of 150 points or less. That character has the X-Men keyword this game.

special_powers.name: LEASHED OR UNLEASHED?
special_powers.description: Sabretooth and Wild Child begins the game with Wild Child attached and can use Flurry while he's attached. At the beginning of your turn, if Wild Child is within 3 squares of Sabretooth and Wild Child, you may reattach him. Give Sabretooth and Wild Child a free action if he hasn't used Flurry this turn to place an attached Wild Child adjacent.

special_powers.name: HEALING FACTOR
special_powers.description: When Sabretooth and Wild Child clears action tokens, you may heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: WHAT KIND OF SLAUGHTER DO I FEEL LIKE TODAY?
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, if Sugar Man was not equipped with any other item during force construction, you may choose two of these three objects as described on this card: Axe, Hammer, Sword. Sugar Man may be equipped with both chosen objects.  When on the map, Sugar Man's Weapons are considered heavy objects. A character in a square with or holding this object may be given a power action to equip it. If not equipped, this object can only be KO'd in an object attack. A character equipped with one of these objects may use the following effects:  Attack rolls of 10-12 count as critical hits.  When character hits an opposing character, after actions resolve you may give that character an action token if your attack was 10-12.  Can use Blades/Claws/Fangs.

special_powers.name: TWO FEET, FOUR ARMS
special_powers.description: Sugar Man can use Flurry and Sidestep.

special_powers.name: BIO-ELECTRIC TONGUE OF EXTREME LENGTH
special_powers.description: Give Sugar Man a ranged combat action. Make a range attack targeting a single opposing character within 6 squares and line of fire. The hit character is dealt 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage and placed adjacent.

special_powers.name: SHRUNK MYSELF INTO YOUR BOOT
special_powers.description: STOP. Sugar Man has Tiny Damage Symbol and can't be healed. When this click is revealed, place any equipped objects onto the map adjacent to Sugar Man. When an adjacent opposing character moves or is placed, after actions resolve you may place Sugar Man adjacent to that character.

special_powers.name: BURN, MY NEMESIS
special_powers.description: When Sunfire hits an opposing character, after actions resolve attach the Fire marker to a hit opposing character, removing it from anywhere else. At the beginning of that character's turn, deal it 1 penetrating damage. When that character moves through water terrain or clears action tokens, remove the Fire marker

special_powers.name: EXPLODE AND REFORM
special_powers.description: Sunfire can use Pulse Wave. When he does, after actions resolve heal him 1 click for each hit character.

special_powers.name: *SNIKT*
special_powers.description: When an opposing character takes damage from his close attack, after actions resolve you may attach the Slash marker to that character, removing it from anywhere else. When the character with the Slash marker is given an action token, deal it 1 penetrating damage. When that character heals or clears action tokens, remove the Slash maker.

special_powers.name: STILL THE BEST IN THE BUSINESS
special_powers.description: Weapon X can use Charge, Sidestep, and Stealth.

special_powers.name: LET ME HELP YOU CLEAR YOUR HEAD
special_powers.description: Adjacent opposing characters can't use the EFFECT of equipped items.

special_powers.name: YOU THINK YOU'RE REALLY HERE?
special_powers.description: Professor X can use Phasing/Teleport and Mind Control. When he uses Mind Control, he doesn't take feedback damage.

name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning
Jean Grey School for Higher Learning Grounds

special_powers.name: Krakoa Lives on the School Grounds Now
special_powers.description: At the end of each player's turn, an opponent chooses a character who that turn missed an attack whose line of fire crossed printed hindering or blocking terrain. Krakoa makes a close attack (rolled by opponent) with 10 attack value targeting that character. Hit characters are dealt 3 damage.
